title: For Sale: SGC Auth T206 Joe Kelley Cycle
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: For Sale: SGC Auth T206 Joe Kelley Cycle
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone,

Am trying to generate some funds to land a card I've been chasing for a while...am willing to let this go for less than what I paid for it.  Despite the 'authentic' grade, this card presents very well.


[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/T206_Cycle350_Kelley.jpg[/IMG]

Post here or email me at [url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url]

I also have a polar bear, sovereign 350 and type 2 coupon of Kelley if anyone is interested (scans here: [url]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/baseball/Toronto/[/url])

Regards,

Richard.

Email sent for T206 Kelly Sweet Cap.
--C.

Thanks Chris.  Sweet Cap has been sold.  Link to scans added for other Kelley cards.

Regards,

Richard.

E-mail sent inquiring about the Sovereign back.
Thanks,
--S
